function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on minimum number of satellites for accurate position determination","Impact":"Inaccurate location prediction, potential navigation errors","Mitigation":"Increase the number of satellites used for position determination","Technologies":"Satellite deployment and maintenance technology","People":"Users of GPS navigation systems","Owner":"Satellite operators and maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Dependence on aging satellites with limited lifespan","Impact":"Potential loss of satellite functionality, reduced GPS coverage","Mitigation":"Regular satellite maintenance and timely replacement of aging satellites","Technologies":"Satellite maintenance and replacement technology","People":"GPS users","Owner":"Satellite operators and maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Requirement for clear visibility of four satellites for accurate point calculation","Impact":"Inability to calculate accurate position in obstructed environments","Mitigation":"Development of improved GPS technology to account for obstructed environments","Technologies":"Enhanced satellite signal reception and processing technology","People":"Users of GPS navigation systems","Owner":"GPS technology developers and manufacturers"}]}
